inProgress.message: The verification process usually takes about 5 minutes. Please check your email for the results of your verification request, and then try your purchase again.

pending.title: Verify your Account
pending.message: To ensure your account stays secure, we just need to verify your identity.<1><0>Information provided will be used for verification purposes only</0><0>Shippo will never share your verification information</0><0>The process just takes a few minutes</0></1>

failed.title: We couldn't complete your verification
failed.message_start: We weren't able to complete your verification because of the following:
failed.message_end: Please try again or contact support at support@shippo.com.
failed.no-retry: Please contact our customer support team to complete your verification.

errors.document_expired: You provided an identity document that is expired.
errors.document_unverified_other: We couldn't recognize your form of documentation.
errors.document_type_not_supported: You provided an identity document that is not allowed
errors.selfie_document_missing_photo: We had a hard time finding your picture on your ID.
errors.selfie_face_mismatch: The selfie provided did not match with the document photo.
errors.id_number_unverified_other: We could not verify your ID number.
errors.id_number_insufficient_document_data: We need more information in your provided document to match with the ID number.
errors.id_number_mismatch: We could not verify your ID number.
errors.consent_declined: You declined consent for ID verification.
errors.error_processing_request: Something unexpected happened on our end.
